name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calls and Texts from Hot Prospector

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive inbound calls, sms notifications, send sms/ringless voicemails, and make contact changes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calls and Texts from Hot Prospector use to manage Dialer user account contact also make outbound calls, Inbound call, Send SMS, Send Email, Send RVM also update Contact personal information, Delete Contact and assign tags, Groups using Calls and Texts from Hot Prospector.
